identity.name: Conqueror's Court
principles: Dark Mode First: The app lives in the shadows. Light is used only to guide.
Sharp Hierarchy: Information is ranked ruthlessly. No clutter.
Purple & Pink Haze: Use these accents like neon lights in a dark room.
Ritual-Tech: It's not just a tracker; it's a command center for the body.

typography.instructions: Import 'Cinzel' and 'Manrope' from Google Fonts in index.css. Use Cinzel for all H1-H3 headings to give the 'Court' vibe. Use Manrope for H4-H6 and body text for readability.

buttons.primary: bg-violet-600 hover:bg-violet-700 text-white rounded-none uppercase tracking-widest font-bold px-8 py-4 transition-all duration-300 hover:shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(124,58,237,0.5)]
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-zinc-700 hover:border-pink-500 text-zinc-300 hover:text-pink-500 rounded-none uppercase tracking-widest px-8 py-4 transition-all duration-300

cards.base: bg-zinc-950/50 backdrop-blur-xl border border-zinc-800/50 rounded-none p-6 hover:border-violet-500/30 transition-colors duration-300
cards.highlight: bg-zinc-900/80 border border-violet-500/20 rounded-none p-6 shadow-[0_0_30px_rgba(124,58,237,0.1)]

inputs.base: bg-zinc-950 border-zinc-800 focus:border-violet-500 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-violet-500 rounded-none h-12 text-zinc-100 placeholder:text-zinc-600

visual_enhancers.particles: Use tsparticles or framer-motion for subtle floating dust in the background.

motion.instructions: Use 'AnimatePresence' for page transitions. Elements should fade in and slide up (y: 20 -> y: 0). Hover states should be snappy (duration: 0.2).

implementation_steps: 1. Install fonts: Add Cinzel and Manrope to index.css via @import.
2. Configure Tailwind: Update tailwind.config.js with the new color palette and font families.
3. Global Styles: Apply the dark background (#050505) and text color (#FAFAFA) in index.css.
4. Component Overrides: Customize Shadcn components (Button, Card, Input) in their respective files to match the 'rounded-none' and 'border-zinc-800' style.
5. Layout: Build the Dashboard using the Bento Grid strategy defined in the guidelines.
6. Motion: Wrap page content in Framer Motion components for entrance animations.
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text unless it's a very large headline.
Avoid rounded corners > 4px. Keep it sharp.
Use 'violet-500' for primary actions and 'pink-500' for secondary highlights.
Ensure all text has sufficient contrast against the dark background.
